articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Message of Greetings to State Leaders of China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Message of Greetings to State Leaders of China

					Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, today sent a message of greetings to Hu Jintao, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, Wu Bangguo, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, and Wen Jiabao, Premier of the State Council of the PRC, on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the founding of the PRC.
						 The message said:
						
						 We extend warm congratulations and greetings to you and, through you, to the Communist Party, the government and people of China on behalf of the WPK, the DPRK government and the Korean people on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the founding of the PRC.
						
						 Over the past 59 years since the foundation of the PRC the Chinese people have built a socialist state with Chinese characteristics, overcoming manifold difficulties. 
						
						 Noting that the Chinese people have achieved great successes in the struggle to build a harmonious socialist society based on the scientific view on development and attain the reunification of the whole country under the leadership of the CPC headed by General Secretary Hu Jintao, the message continued: 
						
						 The Korean people are rejoiced over them and sincerely wish the Chinese people greater success in the work to carry out the tasks set forth at the 17th Congress of the CPC.
						
						 It is the consistent stand of our Party and government to steadily consolidate and develop the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations.
						
						 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we express belief that the traditional DPRK-China friendly relations will grow stronger thanks to the common efforts of the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries and sincerely wish the PRC prosperity and the Chinese people happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Chinese Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Chinese Foreign Minister

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Yang Jiechi, minister of Foreign Affairs of China, on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China. 
						 The message said the Korean people sincerely rejoice over the great successes made by the Chinese people in their efforts to build socialism with Chinese characteristics under the leadership of the Communist Party of China over the past 59 years. 
						
						 It expressed expectation that the cooperation between the foreign ministries of the two countries to develop the DPRK-China friendly relations would grow stronger.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Syrian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Syrian President

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of sympathy to Syrian President Bashar AlÔºçAssad on Sept. 29 in connection with the terrorist bomb blast that occurred in Damascus recently, killing or wounding many innocent people.
						 Kim in the message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the president, the government and people of Syria and the victims and the bereaved families of the dead.
						
						 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea government, which opposes all forms of terrorism and any support to it, vehemently denounces the bomb blast as a hateful terrorist act to disturb the security and stability of Syria, the message said.
						
						 The message reiterated the full support and solidarity of the government and people of the DPRK for the just struggle of the president, the friendly government and people of Syria to protect the peace and security of the country and national unity and stability.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Syrian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Syrian Prime Minister

					Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of sympathy to Muhammad Nazi Otri, Prime Minister of the Cabinet of Syria, on Sept. 29 in connection with the recent barbarous terrorism that occurred in Damascus, claiming casualties.
						 The message expressed profound sympathy and consolation to the Syrian government and people and the victims of terrorism and the bereaved families of the dead and extended firm support and solidarity to the prime minister, the government and people of Syria in their just measures and efforts to protect the national unity and social stability.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Syrian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Syrian Foreign Minister

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a message of sympathy to Walid Al Moualem, minister of Foreign Affairs of Syria, in connection with the recent terrorist bomb blast that occurred in Damascus, killing or wounding dozens of people. 
						 Pak, in his message, extended full support and solidarity to him and his ministry in their efforts to foil all sorts of sabotages of the hostile forces, protect the security and stability of the country and ensure fair and comprehensive peace in the Mideast region.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from British Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from British Ambassador to DPRK

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Peter Hughes, ambassador of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
						 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Marked

					Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place in Taehongdan County, Ryanggang Province on Tuesday to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Bringing about a Signal Turn in Potato Farming".
						 Kim Jong Il in the work published in October Juche 87 (1998) comprehensively clarified all matters arising in bringing about a signal turn in potato farming including the issues of cultivating in a big way potato, a high-yield crop, raising the per-hectare yield, intensifying the scientific researches into seed potato and its cultivation, increasing the state investment, setting an example and generalizing it and transporting, storing and processing potato. 
						
						 Present at the meeting were Choe Thae Bok and Choe Yong Rim and Kwak Pom Gi, vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Pak Nam Gi, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of ministries and national institutions, officials and other working people in the above-said province.
						
						 Choe Thae Bok said in a report that Kim Jong Il's work is an important work as it laid a milestone for effecting a landmark turn in solving the people's problem of food and developing agriculture, and a banner for dynamically pushing forward the work to improve the standard of people's living and the building of a great prosperous powerful nation.
						
						 Referring to the fact that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the struggle to implement the WPK's policy of bringing about a signal turn in potato farming, the reporter noted that Taehongdan County has turned into a model unit in the drive to bring about a signal turn in potato farming and its example has been generalized throughout the country under the care of the peerlessly great man to make the waves of the above-mentioned drive sweep all parts of the country.
						
						 An important achievement made in carrying out the above-said policy is that a productive surge has been effected in potato farming, a solid scientific and technological foundation laid for it, dependable core forces for potato farming have been built  and a radical turn taken place in the people's way of thinking and work style, the reporter added. 
						
						 He called on all the servicepersons and people to unite closer around Kim Jong Il with one thought and purpose and dynamically accelerate the cause of building a rich and powerful nation with the might of their single-minded unity.

articles.title: Officials of Ministries and National Institutions Visit Taehongdan County
articles.content:
Officials of Ministries and National Institutions Visit Taehongdan County

					
						
							 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Officials of ministries, national institutions and Ryanggang Province visited different parts of Taehongdan County of the province Tuesday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Bringing about a Signal Turn in Potato Farming".
						 They first laid bouquets in front of the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing at the Monument to the Victorious Battles in the Musan Area and paid tribute to him in humble reverence.
						
						 Then, they went round fields of the Second Work-Team of the Changphyong Farm, the Fourth Work-Team of the Hongam Farm, the Potato Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Paeksan Pig Farm, the Taehongdan Potato Processing Factory and other places. 
						
						 They were impressed to hear about the immortal history of the leadership provided by the President and Kim Jong Il to the relevant units and shining achievements made by them under the warm care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
						
						 While visiting different parts of the county, they grasped once again the validity and vitality of the above-said policy of the WPK.

articles.title: Development of Sino-DPRK Friendship Called for
articles.content:
Development of Sino-DPRK Friendship Called for

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association who visited the DPRK to attend the celebrations of the 50th anniversaries of the DPRK-China Friendship Association and the China-Korea Friendship Association, had an interview with KCNA at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Sunday.
						 Noting that the above-said associations have positively contributed to the development of the friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries over the past five decades since their formation, he said:
						
						 The Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations provided by Chairman Mao Zedong, Premier Zhou Enlai and President Kim Il Sung are a valuable asset of the two peoples.
						
						 The bilateral friendship is indestructible and durable as it has stood all trials of history and taken strong roots in the hearts of the two peoples.
						
						 It is the unchangeable policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily develop the bilateral relationship of friendship.
						
						 We will further develop this long-standing relationship in the spirit of inheriting tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation.
						
						 The Sino-DPRK friendship is growing stronger with each passing day under the deep care of respected Comrade Hu Jintao, Comrade Jiang Zemin and the great General Secretary Comrade Kim Jong Il.
						
						 The two countries are closely cooperating with each other in politics, the economy, culture and other fields for the common interests and the improvement of welfare of their peoples.
						
						 Events were held in Beijing and Pyongyang to commemorate the 50th anniversaries of the China-Korea Friendship Association and the DPRK-China Friendship Association.
						
						 They marked an important occasion in powerfully demonstrating the solidity and invincibility of friendship and solidarity forged between the peoples of China and the DPRK.
						
						 2009 is a significant year marking the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries, he said, and went on:
						
						 Colorful events will take place in the next year, injecting new vitality in the bilateral friendship.
						
						 The China-Korea Friendship Association will strive to strengthen and develop the Sino-DPRK friendship in keeping with intention of the supreme leaders of the two countries in the future, too.
						
						 I am convinced that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation will develop on a wider scale by the joint efforts of the governments and peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace

					
						Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace was founded on September 30, Juche 52 (1963).
						  It, which covers tens of thousands of square meters, consists of several buildings. It has hundreds of circle rooms, a theatre, a gymnasium, an open-air practice place, a library, an animal and plant museum and amusement rooms, etc.
						
						It, with a capacity of accommodating more than 10,000 people a day, has made a positive contribution to the extracurricular education of schoolchildren by conducting the education in social and natural sciences, music and art, sports and other fields in various forms including circle and mass activities.
						
						President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il have sent to the palace tens of thousands of pieces of educational apparatuses and books.
						
						 Under their warm care, the palace has brought up hundreds of thousands of pupils in the past 45 years. Among them are little musicians, dancers, computer technicians, Taekwon-Do players, calligraphers and auto-technicians.
						
						 The Pyongyang schoolchildren's art troupe formed with circle members of the palace as the main has been widely known in the world for its high degree of artistic ability.
						
						 Over the last period the troupe has performed not only at home but also in more than 30 countries including China, Japan, Indonesia, Czech Republic, Spain, Guinea and Peru amid warm applause of the audience. Such prodigies of the troupe have cultivated their artistic talent through the extracurricular education centres including the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace to their hearts' content under the care of the state.
						
						 Since the foundation of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and many schoolchildren's palaces and schoolchildren's halls have made their appearance in Kaesong, Samjiyon and in all provinces, cities and counties, where schoolchildren are growing up as future pillars of the country. 
						
						 Choe Thae Bok said in a report that Kim Jong Il's work is an important work as it laid a milestone for effecting a landmark turn in solving the people's problem of food and developing agriculture, and a banner for dynamically pushing forward the work to improve the standard of people's living and the building of a great prosperous powerful nation.
						
						 Referring to the fact that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the struggle to implement the WPK's policy of bringing about a signal turn in potato farming, the reporter noted that Taehongdan County has turned into a model unit in the drive to bring about a signal turn in potato farming and its example has been generalized throughout the country under the care of the peerlessly great man to make the waves of the above-mentioned drive sweep all parts of the country.
						
						 An important achievement made in carrying out the above-said policy is that a productive surge has been effected in potato farming, a solid scientific and technological foundation laid for it, dependable core forces for potato farming have been built  and a radical turn taken place in the people's way of thinking and work style, the reporter added. 
						
						 He called on all the servicepersons and people to unite closer around Kim Jong Il with one thought and purpose and dynamically accelerate the cause of building a rich and powerful nation with the might of their single-minded unity.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Reckless Moves to Tighten Military Nexus with U.S. Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Reckless Moves to Tighten Military Nexus with U.S. Flayed

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Japan test-fired PAC-3 of the Air "Self-Defense Force" in the U.S. forces' missile test site in New Mexico State of the United States. 
						 In this regard, the Japanese reactionaries held a joint press conference on the spot at which they shouted "bravo" over Japan's "successful" test of the anti-ballistic missile system, the first of its kind in its history, and called for closer cooperation with the U.S. in the fields of technology and information to bolster its missile defence capability in the future.
						
						 Japan's moves to build a missile shield are not aimed at "protecting" itself from anyone's "threat" quite contrary to the claim of the Japanese reactionaries but at rounding off its preparations for invading other countries through preemptive attacks.
						
						 Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed commentary. 
						
						 It goes on:
						
						 Japan is dreaming of realizing its wild ambition for reinvasion by making a military attack on any country any moment. 
						
						  To this end, it is becoming so vociferous about somebody's non-existent "missile threat" and getting evermore desperate in its moves to build the missile shield in collusion with the U.S. under the pretext of "defence". 
						
						 The Japanese reactionaries are taking the lead in the international sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK under the pretext of what they called "missile threat". This is nothing but a crafty artifice to justify their criminal moves to convert Japan into a military power and launch reinvasion and cover up their danger. 
						
						 They are sparking off and aggravating territorial disputes as evidenced by the fact that they described Tok Islet of Korea as part of "Japan's territory" in the recently announced "2008 white paper on defense". This is a deliberate provocation aimed at reinvasion.
						
						 The Japanese reactionaries are bound to be judged by history for having run amuck to realize their wild ambition for reinvasion through closer military nexus with the U.S., their master.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition for Overseas Expansion Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition for Overseas Expansion Blasted

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government at a recent Cabinet meeting adopted a resolution on extending one year the "new law on special measures against terrorism" due to expire on January 15 next year.
						 Prior to this, former Japanese Prime Minister Fukuda promised U.S. President Bush the Japan "Self-Defense Forces'" continued performance of their refueling mission in the Indian Ocean. The Japan Liberal Democratic Party, too, criticized opposition parties standing against the convocation of an extraordinary Diet meeting while persistently calling for convening it for the extension of the new law.
						
						 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday observes:
						
						 The Japanese reactionaries seek to realize their ambition for overseas aggression at any cost through the SDF's overseas advance and their continued military operations under the pretext of "cooperation in UN peace-keeping operations".
						
						  While working hard to extend the above-said law, the Japanese reactionaries seek to enact what they called a "permanent law" in a bid to justify the rapid dispatch of huge SDF troops overseas, regardless of place and time.
						
						 It was also to serve this purpose that the Japanese government underscored the need to institute the "permanent law" for the overseas dispatch of the SDF in the recently announced "2008 white paper on defense".
						
						 The Japanese reactionaries' moves to extend the new law, institute the "permanent law" and equip SDF troops with modern weapons, etc. bring into bolder relief the grave and dangerous nature of their evermore undisguised moves to emerge a military power and launch overseas expansion.
						
						 Their attempt to realize the ambition for overseas expansion while talking about "peace" will get them nowhere in the bright world today as it is no more than a pipedream.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Fully Display Korean Nation-First Spirit
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Fully Display Korean Nation-First Spirit

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation-first spirit serves as an invincible banner to be always held aloft by all Koreans in the sacred struggle for independent reunification and peace and prosperity. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
						 The Korean nation-first spirit is an ideological basis for establishing national sovereignty and the source of the spirit of national independence, the article notes, and goes on:
						
						 This spirit reflects the unanimous will of all compatriots to firmly protect the country and nation from foreign forces' war of aggression. 
						
						 The Korean nation has a good tradition in which it has fully demonstrated the spirit of the nation with which it never yielded to foreign forces' moves for aggression.
						
						 The above-said spirit also represents the firm will of the Korean nation to foil the foreign forces' moves for a war of aggression to disturb the peace and security of the country by carrying forward its glorious tradition of the struggle against aggression.
						
						 It is an important task facing the Korean nation to oppose war and defend peace.
						
						 The U.S. imperialists are now resorting to adventurous moves to carry out their policy to dominate the DPRK through military invasion despite the opposition of the whole nation and the world peace-loving people.
						
						 The will to frustrate foreign forces' moves for aggression and war and firmly defend the peace of the country in a do-or-die spirit is a clear manifestation of the Korean nation-first spirit. 
						
						 Independent reunification and peace and prosperity are what the Koreans unanimously desire and demand. 
						
						 The spirit of "By our nation itself" enshrined in the historic June 15 joint declaration is the idea of independent reunification and peace and prosperity based on the Korean nation-first spirit.
						
						It is beyond doubt that a rich and powerful reunified country will appear on the land of 3,000-ri when the Koreans hold aloft the banner of the Korean nation-first spirit which reinforces their pride and self-confidence that it is the best and their faith and will to energetically carve out their destiny by themselves.

articles.title: At Least 180 Cases of Aerial Espionage Perpetrated
articles.content:
At Least 180 Cases of Aerial Espionage Perpetrated

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet armed forces committed frantic aerial espionage against the DPRK in September by massively mobilizing all strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions, according to a military source.  
						 In September the U.S. imperialists committed more than 110 cases of aerial espionage against the DPRK and the south Korean puppet armed forces at least 70 cases, bringing the total number of cases of espionage to more than 180.
						
						 On Sept. 29, overseas-based RC-135 belonging to the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces flew into the sky of areas of south Korea to perpetrate aerial espionage. That day a total of seven spy planes were busy with aerial photographing and electronic reconnaissance against all areas of the north. 
						
						 On Sept. 12 an overseas-based U-2 and a U-2 stationed in an air force base of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea  flew in the air above areas along the front almost every day and night to spy on the major targets in the depth of areas of the north side.
						
						 E-3 took off a base of Japan on Sept. 10, 11, 16 and 17 to command the aerial war exercises of flying corps of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet armed forces and commit madcap aerial espionage against the north.
						
						 Meanwhile, more than two or three RC-800s and RF-4Cs of the south Korean puppet armed forces were busy everyday with aerial observation and photographing of areas of the north side.
						
						 Such aerial espionage timed to coincide with the frantic war exercises perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists after deploying aggressor forces in south Korea goes to prove that the aggression moves of their warmongers and the south Korean puppet troops against the north have reached an extremely reckless phase.

articles.title: Release of Patriotic Student and Abolition of NSL Demanded
articles.content:
Release of Patriotic Student and Abolition of NSL Demanded

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 16th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils on Sept. 26 issued a statement titled "Release fellow student Kim Chan Ju of Chosun University and abolish the 'National Security Law' without delay."
						 The statement accused the security authorities of perpetrating such tyrannical action as walking off Kim Chan Ju, chairman of the student council of Gyeongsang College of Chosun University, on the charge of violating the NSL that day.
						
						 The number of those arrested on charges of violation of the NSL is on the steady increase at a time when a terror-ridden atmosphere of suppression under the pretext of "security" is prevailing throughout south Korea after Lee Myung Bak's seizure of power, the statement noted, and went on:
						
						 Under the pretext of regaining "the lost decade" the Lee Myung Bak regime is frantically intensifying the suppression of people, regarding the above-said fascist law as the most effective weapon and lever for realizing its sinister political ambition.
						
						 What is more deplorable is that those who participated in recent candlelight actions are suppressed on charges of violating the NSL and being "leftists" and "Reds." 
						
						 There is no ground whatsoever for the NSL to remain in force in this land any longer.
						
						 People are becoming increasingly aware of the need to form an alliance with the north. No matter how desperately the Lee Myung Bak regime works to achieve its aim, faking up "spyring cases," etc. none of our people will be taken in by such sheer lies. 
						
						 The NSL can never serve as a spear or as a shield. It is nothing but a leftover that should have been thrown away long ago.
						
						 The Lee Myung Bak regime should abolish the NSL and set free all the prisoners of conscience at once.

articles.title: Measures to Intensify Suppression of Participants in Candlelight Actions under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Measures to Intensify Suppression of Participants in Candlelight Actions under Fire in S. Korea

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean People's Measure Council against the Total Opening of south Korean Markets to American Beef on Sept. 26 denounced the puppet authorities for pushing forward measures to more brutally crack down upon the participants of candlelight actions.
						 The organization recalled that that day an official concerned of the Supreme Public Prosecutor's Office blustered that "a proposal is now under consideration to treat as 'chronic offenders' those who were once punished for participating in illegal violent meetings or those who are likely to spearhead an extreme demonstration again in the future among those accused of being involved in candlelight demonstrations."
						
						 Earlier, the organization disclosed the fact that the prosecution examined even a proposal for branding those who participated in the actions including "protests against the expansion of the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek and the struggle to check the conclusion of the south Korea-U.S. "FTA" as "habitual demonstrators".
						
						 These reckless actions of the authorities are an extension of the repressive measure called "proposal for sternly dealing with any illegal group action" set forth by the Ministry of Justice in March last.
						
						 The measures taken by the security authorities to intensify the violent crackdown are reckless ones for suppressing the freedom of assembly and demonstration and an outright infringement on human rights as they are aimed at branding the people of various strata who participated in the candlelight actions as "potential criminals".
						
						 The organization demanded the Lee "government" stop at once its anti-human rights and unpopular actions to revive the method of suppressing people dating back to the past period of fascist dictatorship.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Indonesian Political Figure
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Indonesian Political Figure
						

					
						 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Harinde Singh, secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Unity Party of Indonesia, released a statement on Sept. 25 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
						 In the statement he noted that under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the WPK has further developed into a guiding force ushering the Korean people's struggle into victory and glory.
						
						 Thanks to the correct leadership of the WPK the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a political and military power which no one dares provoke, while firmly defending its sovereignty and dignity by itself, he said.
						
						 Expressing positive support and firm solidarity with the WPK's struggle for building a great prosperous powerful nation and the reunification of the country, the National Leading Council of the Diversity Unity Party of Indonesia wishes the Korean people greater successes in the future struggle for victory of their cause, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a los dirigentes chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a los dirigentes chinos
						

					
						Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 59o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular China (RPCh) el Dirigente      Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Kim Yong Nam y el premier del Consejo de Ministros Kim Yong Il, envio el dia 30 un mensaje de felicitacion a Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la RPCh y presidente  de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh, Wu Bangguo, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional y Wen Jiabao, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la RPCh.
						  La misiva senala:
						
						  Con motivo del 59o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPCh, en nombre del PTC, el gobierno de la RPDC y el pueblo coreano enviamos la calurosa felicitacion y saludo a ustedes y, por su conducto, al PCCh, el gobierno y el pueblo de China.
						
						  Durante 59 anos pasados que datan de la fundacion de la RPCh el pueblo chino construyo el Estado socialista con peculiaridad china superando multiples dificultades.
						
						  Hoy, bajo la direccion del PCCh encabezado por el camarada Hu Jintao el pueblo chino logra grandes exitos en la lucha por construir la armoniosa sociedad socialista basada en la concepcion del desarrollo cientifico y realizar la reunificacion de todo el pais.
						
						  El pueblo coreano se regocija del respecto y desea de todo corazon que el pueblo chino logre mayores exitos en las labores por materializar las tareas presentadas en el XVII Congreso del PCCh.
						
						  El partido y el gobierno de Corea mantienen la invariable posicion de consolidar y desarrollar incesantemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con China.
						
						  Convencidos de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad Corea-China se fortaleceran y desarrollaran aun mas por los esfuerzos comunes de los partidos, gobiernos y pueblos de los dos paises, aprovechamos  esta ocasion para formular sinceros votos por el florecimiento y la prosperidad de la RPCh y la felicidad del pueblo de vuestro pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo al presidente siriaco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo al presidente siriaco

					
						Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 29 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al - Assad, en relacion con que recientemente numerosas personas inocentes resultaron muertas o heridas debido al acto terrorista con bomba en Damasco.
						El remitente expreso profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario, el gobierno y pueblo siriacos, los danados y a los familiares de los difuntos.
						
						Subrayo que el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que rechaza el terrorismo de todo tipo y cualquier ayuda a esto, condena categoricamente ese incidente calificandolo de abominable accion terrorista encaminada a destruir la seguridad y estabilidad de Siria.
						
						Aprovechando esta ocasion, ratifico entero apoyo y solidaridad del gobierno de la RPDC y el pueblo coreano a la justa lucha del destinatario, el amistoso gobierno y pueblo siriacos por defender la paz, la seguridad, la unidad nacional y la estabilidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il envia telegrama de consuelo a su homologo siriaco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il envia telegrama de consuelo a su homologo siriaco
						

					
						Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En relacion con que hubo perdidas humanas por el barbaro acto terrorista ocurrido recientemente en Damasco, el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Il, envio la vispera el telegrama de consuelo a su homologo de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Muhammad Nazi Otri.
						Expresando profunda compasion y consuelo al gobierno y el pueblo de Siria y a las victimas y los familiares de los difuntos, el remitente envio firme apoyo y solidaridad a la justa medida y esfuerzo del destinatario, el gobierno y pueblo siriacos por preservar la unidad nacional y la estabilidad social.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador britanico

Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador britanico

					
						  Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, recibio este martes en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino Unido de Gran Bretana e Irlanda del Norte en Corea, Peter Hughes.
						  Seguidamente, Kim sostuvo conversaciones con el diplomatico.
